overview: In One Track Mind, Domino eats alone, but not for long. He and Aaron Austin have quiet dinners in the same restaurant, but their minds race with what if's. Domino imagines sex between a fireman who cruises a motorist, a cabbie who gets sex-jacked into a three-way, a pair of rump rangers, and two sunbathers. Finally, Aaron and Domino have each other for dessert!
title: One Track Mind
